Default potential
-----------------

Default pseudopotentials are listd here.
::

    GGA:
     H: H
     He: He
     Li: Li
     Be: Be
     B: B
     C: C
     N: N
     O: O
     F: F
     Ne: Ne
     Na: Na
     Mg: Mg
     Al: Al
     Si: Si
     P: P
     S: S
     Cl: Cl
     Ar: Ar
     K: K_pv
     Ca: Ca_pv
     Sc: Sc_sv
     Ti: Ti
     V: V
     Cr: Cr
     Mn: Mn
     Fe: Fe
     Co: Co
     Ni: Ni
     Cu: Cu
     Zn: Zn
     Ga: Ga
     Ge: Ge
     As: As
     Se: Se
     Br: Br
     Kr: Kr
     Rb: Rb_pv
     Sr: Sr_sv
     Y: Y_sv
     Zr: Zr_sv
     Nb: Nb_pv
     Mo: Mo
     Tc: Tc
     Ru: Ru
     Rh: Rh
     Pd: Pd
     Ag: Ag
     Cd: Cd
     In: In
     Sn: Sn
     Sb: Sb
     Te: Te
     I: I
     Xe: Xe
     Cs: Cs_sv
     Ba: Ba_sv
     La: La
     Ce: Ce
     Pr: Pr
     Nd: Nd
     Pm: Pm
     Sm: Sm
     Eu: Eu
     Gd: Gd
     Tb: Tb_3
     Dy: Dy_3
     Ho: Ho_3
     Er: Er_2
     Tm: Tm
     Yb: Yb
     Lu: Lu
     Hf: Hf
     Ta: Ta
     W: W
     Re: Re
     Os: Os
     Ir: Ir
     Pt: Pt
     Au: Au
     Hg: Hg
     Tl: Tl
     Pb: Pb
     Bi: Bi
     Ac: Ac
     Th: Th
     Pa: Pa
     U: U
     Np: Np
     Pu: Pu

::
